text: Arne Solli (6 April 1938 - 20 September 2017) was a Norwegian general. He served as Chief of Defence of Norway (Forsvarssjef) from 31 October 1994 until 30 April 1999.U.S. DOD Reference to General Solli He was born in Oslo, Norway In 1995 he was awarded the title of Commander of the Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav. Solli died on 20 September 2017 in Oslo at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:European military people Category:People from Oslo
title: Arne Solli
